backend/main.mo: Defines mood, gender, relationship intent, and user profile types with conversion helpers inside an actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining light and dark mode design tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the app and loading the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, React Query, theme provider, and global sound provider, defining all main routes.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Empty file placeholder for a removed footer component.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Header with app title, theme toggle, journal button, and user dropdown including profile and sign‑out actions.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Top‑level layout with header, routed content, bottom nav, floating journal button, overlay, and sound effects manager.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Fixed bottom navigation bar with icon‑based route buttons and unread notifications badge logic.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Floating action button for creating a new status, shown or hidden based on journal visibility context.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Icon button that switches between light and dark themes using next‑themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper showing loading, login panel, or app children based on Internet Identity state.
Renders the main login UI using Internet Identity with randomized copy, error handling, and a progressive disclosure section.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Displays a summary of circle activity by generating an energy description from a list of posts.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Shows current circle members with profile details and allows removing members via confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Provides a form to enter and submit a share code to request joining another user's circle.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Lists pending join requests with requester profile info and actions to accept or decline each request.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Lets users select up to two Safe People from eligible candidates with toggle actions and loading states.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Displays the user’s share code with copy and edit functionality, allowing updates that invalidate pending requests.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: A button component that displays an icon with a tooltip using a wrapped Button and Tooltip.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: A collapsible section with a trigger button that reveals content, styled with optional variants.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: A reminder card prompting users to complete a mood check-in with options to dismiss or navigate to the check‑in page.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Displays a silent signal entry with mood styling, author info, and timestamp, highlighting if it belongs to the current user.
Allows users to send predefined silent signals to Safe People, showing setup prompts or send buttons with loading states.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: A popover date picker for journal entries using a button trigger and calendar selection.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Manages viewing, adding, and deleting journal entries for a selected date with edit restrictions for past days.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: A slide‑in journal interface combining rules, date selection, and entry management.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Shows personalized micro‑action suggestions based on mood history or fallback guidance when insufficient data exists.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Displays mood analysis over a selected timeframe, showing trends, concern levels, top moods, and related micro‑actions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates access based on profile load state, handling loading, errors, and onboarding flow before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Guides users through multi‑step profile creation, validating inputs and saving the completed profile.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Listens for new notifications, feed items, join requests, and circle members to trigger appropriate sound effects.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: Allows selecting predefined context tags or adding custom ones with validation and soft‑limit feedback.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Provides searchable, categorized mood selection with visual cues and selection highlighting.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Modal prompt suggesting micro‑actions and offering to open a private journal note after a status post.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a user’s mood status with author info, timestamp, mood styling, and optional audience count.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Defines predefined context tags plus limits for tag count and custom tag length.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Provides short foundational messaging describing the app’s promise and boundaries.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Contains rotating login screen phrases and a helper to pick a random one.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Lists all mood options with labels, emojis, and categories mapped to backend mood values.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Defines sound asset paths and the SoundCue type.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Context controlling visibility of the floating journal UI with show/hide methods.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Context managing the journal overlay’s open state and reset behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Sound context managing preference, audio unlocking, and playback for app sound cues.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching a backend actor based on identity and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wrapper around useActor adding error tracking and refetch capability.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, exposing identity state, login/clear actions, and status flags using Dfinity's AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: React Query hooks to fetch, create/update, and delete journal entries via the backend actor, with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a user's mood history from feed data filtered by timeframe and identity, returning sorted mood entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for profiles, share codes, join requests, feed items, and status actions with mutation helpers and cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Thin wrapper exposing the SoundContext hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, mood colors, and safe-area utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Circle overview page showing energy, members, join requests, join form, and safe people using tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Status composer page allowing mood selection, audience picking, context tags, and posting updates with optional journal prompt.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Daily check-in form allowing users to select mood, write content, choose audience, and submit a status with optional private note prompt.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays the user's feed with status updates, silent signals, and a mood reminder, including refresh and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows unread and read notifications, supports marking as read, and navigates to related status details.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile view and editor allowing updates to personal details, preferences, and settings with validation.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single status with error handling and navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Utility functions for calculating age, formatting dates, and parsing date input values.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Analyzes recent status posts to categorize circle mood and generate a weekly energy summary.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Provides helpers to normalize and validate custom tags, checking emptiness, length, and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Implements a one-time sessionStorage guard for entering daily check‑in mode.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Defines micro‑actions and generates suggestions based on recent moods and context tags using simple rule logic.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Analyzes mood history to compute distributions, trends, concern levels, and guidance with a built‑in disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient class strings for styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Manages a once‑per‑day mood reminder using localStorage to track dismissal by date.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character alphanumeric onboarding share code without ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets a boolean sound‑enabled preference stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides time conversion between bigint nanoseconds and Date plus common date utility helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction, persistence via sessionStorage, and cleanup for both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, content scanning, custom OKLCH color system, extended utilities, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current app state, high‑level product summary, and a list of implemented features with versions.
